I

index(int, int) - Method in class collectogame.Board
Calculates the index in the linear array of fields from a (row, column) pair.

Initialize a new random board.

Check the board after moves has any pairs of ball with same color.
isEndGame() - Method in class collectogame.Board
GameOver when there is no possible move.
isField(int) - Method in class collectogame.Board
Returns true if index is a valid index of a field on the board.
isField(int, int) - Method in class collectogame.Board
Returns true of the (row,col) pair refers to a valid field on the board.
isOurTurn() - Method in class collectoclient.CollectoClient
Check if it is client's turn.
isStillPossibleDoubleMove() - Method in class collectogame.Board
Checks if there is a doubleMove possible, so a move returns in collecting balls.
